snippet: Twitter Inc's messaging service will have close to 400 million global users by 2018, mostly in Asia, Latin American and the Middle East, consulting firm eMarketer estimated on Tuesday, far short of the 1 billion once expected....

headline.print_headline: Nearly 400 Million Twitter Users Estimated by 2018: Study
headline.main: Nearly 400 Million Twitter Users Estimated by 2018: Study

lead_paragraph: Twitter Inc's messaging service will have close to 400 million global users by 2018, mostly in Asia, Latin American and the Middle East, consulting firm eMarketer estimated on Tuesday, far short of the 1 billion once expected.
